title: Yu Yang City · Forty Years Later

scenes.description: 画面淡入,展现云雾缭绕的仙域上空,金色卷轴在空中展开,光芒闪动,背景音乐渐起。

visual.composition: Misty immortal skies with a golden scroll unfurling
visual.environment: Immortal realm sky filled with swirling clouds and golden light
visual.fx: Golden radiance and unfolding scroll effect

scenes.prompt: Xianxia opening, mist-wreathed immortal sky with a golden scroll unfurling, spiritual particles drifting, wide shot, cinematic lighting, 4K
scenes.narration: 我是云卷仙音,欢迎回来。第13集:虞阳城中·四十年光阴。

scenes.description: 虞阳城四十年光阴悄然逝去,韩立已在城中生活多年。

visual.composition: Forty years have passed in Yu Yang City, Han Li has lived in the city for many years

scenes.prompt: Forty years have passed in Yu Yang City, showing the city's changing appearance over time.
scenes.narration: 虞阳城四十年光阴悄然逝去,韩立已在城中生活多年。

scenes.description: 隆兴拍卖行大厅中,范胖子来回走动,一脸焦虑。

visual.composition: In the Longxing Auction House hall, Fan Pang paces back and forth, looking anxious

scenes.prompt: Inside the Longxing Auction House, Fan Pang paces anxiously in the hall, waiting.
scenes.narration: 隆兴拍卖行大厅中,范胖子来回走动,一脸焦虑。

scenes.description: 范胖子不时望向门口,焦急等待韩大师到来。

visual.composition: Fan Pang frequently glances toward the door, anxiously waiting for Master Han to arrive
visual.environment: Auction house hall, door in background

scenes.prompt: Fan Pang keeps looking toward the entrance, anxiously awaiting Master Han's arrival.
scenes.narration: 范胖子不时望向门口,焦急等待韩大师到来。

scenes.description: 范胖子命下人到门口查看,韩大师是否到达。

visual.composition: Fan Pang orders a servant to check the door for Master Han's arrival

scenes.prompt: Fan Pang sends a servant to check if Master Han has arrived.
scenes.narration: 范胖子命下人到门口查看,韩大师是否到达。

scenes.description: 韩立缓步走进拍卖行,范胖子见后大喜,连忙迎上。

visual.composition: Han Li enters the auction house slowly, Fan Pang sees him and joyfully rushes forward
visual.character_pose: Han Li entering, Fan Pang welcoming

scenes.prompt: Han Li enters the auction house, and Fan Pang joyfully welcomes him.
scenes.narration: 韩立缓步走进拍卖行,范胖子见后大喜,连忙迎上。

scenes.description: 范胖子向韩立说明,拍卖行需要新的灵具,希望韩大师能帮忙。

visual.composition: Fan Pang explains to Han Li that the auction house needs new artifacts and hopes Master Han can help
visual.character_pose: Fan Pang speaking, Han Li listening

scenes.prompt: Fan Pang explains to Han Li that the auction house needs new spiritual artifacts.
scenes.narration: 范胖子向韩立说明,拍卖行需要新的灵具,希望韩大师能帮忙。

scenes.description: 韩立点头应允,说明当年若非范胖子相助,自己修为早已跌落。

visual.composition: Han Li nods in agreement, saying that if not for Fan Pang's help years ago, his cultivation would have dropped
visual.character_pose: Han Li speaking, Fan Pang listening

scenes.prompt: Han Li agrees and expresses gratitude for Fan Pang's help years ago.
scenes.narration: 韩立点头应允,说明当年若非范胖子相助,自己修为早已跌落。

scenes.description: 韩立说明这四十年来,自己一直在暗中帮助范胖子发展拍卖行。

visual.composition: Han Li explains that for the past forty years, he has been secretly helping Fan Pang develop the auction house
visual.character_pose: Han Li speaking, Fan Pang surprised

scenes.prompt: Han Li reveals that he has been secretly helping Fan Pang's auction house for the past forty years.
scenes.narration: 韩立说明这四十年来,自己一直在暗中帮助范胖子发展拍卖行。

scenes.description: 隆兴拍卖行已成为虞阳城知名拍卖行,范胖子地位也水涨船高。

visual.composition: Longxing Auction House has become famous in Yu Yang City, Fan Pang's status has risen accordingly

scenes.prompt: Longxing Auction House has become a well-known auction house in Yu Yang City.
scenes.narration: 隆兴拍卖行已成为虞阳城知名拍卖行,范胖子地位也水涨船高。

scenes.description: 韩立在虞阳城一待就是数十年,隐姓埋名潜心修炼金刚诀。

visual.composition: Han Li has stayed in Yu Yang City for decades, hiding his identity and quietly cultivating Vajra Art
visual.environment: Yu Yang City at night, time passing
visual.character_pose: Han Li meditating, city scenes changing

scenes.prompt: Han Li has lived in Yu Yang City for decades, quietly cultivating Vajra Art while hiding his identity.
scenes.narration: 韩立在虞阳城一待就是数十年,隐姓埋名潜心修炼金刚诀。

scenes.description: 画面淡出,夜色下的仙城剪影,天空洒落灵光,画面逐渐变暗。

visual.composition: Silhouette of the immortal city beneath night, spiritual light raining from the heavens
visual.environment: Night sky, city silhouette, floating light particles

scenes.prompt: Xianxia ending, immortal city silhouette under the night sky, spiritual particles drifting down, calm mysterious atmosphere, wide shot, cinematic lighting, 4K
scenes.narration: 下一集再见。我是云卷仙音,原著作者忘语。第14集即将开始。
